title: 7 DAYS IN IRAQ... My Unbelievable Trip
author: Yes Theory
description:
ğŸ™ğŸ¼ Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort 
âš¡ï¸ SEEK DISCOMFORT: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory

This week, I traveled to the beautiful country of Iraq.  All my life I'd heard of the war in Iraq and how dangerous it was to visit, but I wanted to go there and explore if for myself to hear the stories that didn't make it into the media.  So, along with Drew Binsky, Lexie Alford and Cory Martin, we were taken around Iraqi Kurdistan by our amazing guide, Baderkhan.

âœˆ Book an Adventure: https://travel.yestheory.com/

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
âº Yes Theory Plus: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTd7KzdwnFE3lm6LCfYDmUQ

https://www.facebook.com/groups/yesfam/
